description:
Bring a little clarity to your water filtration process. The Hiker Pro Transparent Microfilter includes extra features for higher performance and improved versatility. This low-maintenance, field-serviceable microfilter is extremely resistant to clogging, thanks to a high-surface-area pleated filter cartridge surrounded by a fine membrane. It's effective to 0.2 microns, protecting against protozoa and larger bacteria, so you can hydrate with confidence.

  • Transparent housing lets you see if your filter needs cleaning and easily identify potential blockages
  • Filters up to 1L per minute (48 strokes per litre)
  • Universal bottle adapter fits most hydration systems
  • Includes field maintenance kit with cleanable filter protector to extend cartridge life in challenging conditions
  • Quick-connect kit fittings provide compatibility with many hydration systems
  • Pleated glass fibre filter element filters about 1150L, depending on water quality
  • Ergonomic handle is comfortable and easy to pump
  • Includes hydration accessories, pre-filter, universal bottle adapter, carry bag
  • Please note: This is a water-filtration unit, not a water-purifying system
name: Katadyn Hiker Pro Transparent Microfilter
